.. _citing:

Citing lib-ela
==============

If you use *lib-ela* in academic work, please cite the following
reference so we can track impact and continue development.

Preferred citation
------------------

.. code-block:: bibtex

   @software{Amiri_libela_2025,
     author       = {Arya Amiri, Mohamed Hassan, and Contributors},
     title        = {{lib-ela}: Symbolic solid mechanics in Python},
     month        = may,
     year         = 2025,
     publisher    = {Zenodo},
     doi          = {10.5281/zenodo.1234567},
     url          = {https://github.com/aryaa/lib-ela},
     note         = {Version 0.1.0},
   }
